title: This game, is just, so unbalanced.
body:
Or maybe I'm just bad, I don't know. 
Just saw a 5/10/22 zyra support do one of the highest damages in the game. 
Or the leblanc who didn't even have 100 cs at 35 minutes still fucking 1 shot everything. 

But whatever.

replies.body:
zyra support built damage. and she did less damage than 5 people, equal damage to 2.
LB had 19 kills and 16 assists. that's the equivalent of like 400 cs.

Look at any anivia, they will almost assuredly have the highest damage in the game even if they have only a few kills. It is an AoE control mage thing; they do tons of damage over time to lots of targets, but ADCs, fighters and assassins typically get the actual kills.
